select c.*,g.subGroupNames subName,p.cls_name parentName,tp.attrNames,tp.attrIds attrs ,g.subGroupNames subNames,g.subGroupIds subIds from KG_CLASS c left join ( SELECT c.id, group_concat(kp. NAME ORDER BY kp.id) subGroupNames, group_concat(kp.id ORDER BY kp.id) subGroupIds FROM KG_CLASS c LEFT JOIN KG_OBJECT_SUB_GROUP op ON c.id = op.obj_id LEFT JOIN KG_SUB_GROUP kp ON op.sub_group_id = kp.id GROUP BY c.id ) g on c.id=g.id left join KG_CLASS p on p.id=c.parent_id left join ( select c.id ,group_concat(kp.name order by kp.id) attrNames,group_concat(kp.id order by kp.id) attrIds from KG_CLASS c left join KG_OBJECT_PROPERTY op on c.id=op.cls_id left join KG_PROPERTY kp on op.prop_id=kp.id group by c.id ) tp on c.id=tp.id
where 1=1 and c.deleted='0'
AND c.cls_name= #{clsName}
order by c.CREATED_TIME DESC
limit 1

select c.*,g.subGroupNames subName,p.cls_name parentName,tp.attrNames,tp.attrIds attrs ,g.subGroupNames subNames,g.subGroupIds subIds from KG_CLASS c left join ( SELECT c.id, group_concat(kp. NAME ORDER BY kp.id) subGroupNames, group_concat(kp.id ORDER BY kp.id) subGroupIds FROM KG_CLASS c LEFT JOIN KG_OBJECT_SUB_GROUP op ON c.id = op.obj_id LEFT JOIN KG_SUB_GROUP kp ON op.sub_group_id = kp.id GROUP BY c.id ) g on c.id=g.id left join KG_CLASS p on p.id=c.parent_id left join ( select c.id ,group_concat (kp.name order by kp.id) attrNames,group_concat(kp.id order by kp.id) attrIds from KG_CLASS c left join KG_OBJECT_PROPERTY op on c.id=op.cls_id left join KG_PROPERTY kp on op.prop_id=kp.id group by c.id ) tp on c.id=tp.id
where 1=1 and c.deleted='0'
AND c.id= #{id}
limit 1

select c.ID, c.VERSION_ID, c.CLS_NAME,c.PROPERTIES, c.CODE, c. PARENT_ID, c.SORT, c. DIR_ID, c.DIR_CODE, c.ENABLED, c.DELETED, c.CREATED_USER, c.CREATED_TIME, c.remark, c.UPDATED_USER, c.UPDATED_TIME ,g.subGroupNames subName,p.cls_name parentName,tp.attrNames,tp.attrIds attrs ,g.subGroupNames subNames,g.subGroupIds subIds from
c left join (
select id,group_concat(name ORDER BY kid) subGroupNames,group_concat(kid ORDER BY kid) subGroupIds from (
select c.id,kp.name,kp.id kid FROM
c left join KG_OBJECT_SUB_GROUP op on c.id=op.obj_id left join kp on op.sub_group_id=kp.id
) tp where 1=1 group by id
) g on c.id=g.id left join
p on p.id=c.parent_id left join (
select id,GROUP_CONCAT(name ORDER BY kid) attrNames,GROUP_CONCAT(kid order by kid) attrIds from ( select c.id,kp.name,kp.id kid FROM
c LEFT JOIN KG_OBJECT_PROPERTY op ON c. ID = op.cls_id LEFT JOIN
kp ON op.prop_id = kp. ID ) tp where 1=1 group by id
) tp on c.id=tp.id
where 1=1 and c.deleted='0'
AND c.id = #{id}
AND c.cls_name LIKE #{clsName}
AND (
g.subGroupIds like '%${id}%'
or g.subGroupIds is null )
AND c.parent_id in ( select DISTINCT C1.id from c1 left join c2 ON c1.id=c2.parent_id left join c3 ON c3.id=c2.parent_id left join c4 ON c4.id=c3.parent_id left join c5 ON c5.id=c4.parent_id left join c6 ON c6.id=c5.parent_id where C1.parent_id=#{parentId} or c2.PARENT_ID=#{parentId} or c3.PARENT_ID=#{parentId} or c4.PARENT_ID=#{parentId} or c5.PARENT_ID=#{parentId} or c6.PARENT_ID=#{parentId} )
order by c.CREATED_TIME desc,c.sort asc
